attributes.action: Stop Scottish and Welsh MPs being allowed to vote at Westminster on matters concerning only England, where the Scottish Parliament and Welsh Assembly have control over such matters.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is immoral that Scottish and Welsh MPs should be allowed to vote at Westminster on matters which only affect English voters. Where the Scottish Parliament and Welsh Assembly have control over their own issues their reprersentatives in Westminster should have no control over matters which do not concern their constituents. If this were to be introduced England would have in effect our own MPs without the cost of a separate Parliament
